ygData.subject: Re: weapon skills
ygData.msgSnippet: I picked up a Staff of Writhing a couple of days ago, so I ve been working on 1H Blunt skill.  When I first started using it with no skill, skill went up by
ygData.messageBody:
I picked up a Staff of Writhing a couple of days ago, so I've been working
on 1H Blunt skill. When I first started using it with no skill, skill went
up by like 5 points in an hour or two. When I got back to Freeport,
though, I dumped 30 training points into the skill. After that it's been
going up steadily -- I'm up to 80-something now. I just switched my other
hand from tomahawk to a Dvinn dagger, putting another 30 training points
into piercing, to train that skill; I'll see whether that goes up equally
well. (And I still have 40 training points unspent. Bards don't really
have anything to spend them on at high levels, unless we want to learn
languages for no particular reason.)

- Windsong Wanderer
